ðŸ“– Summary: The 'agents' repository provides a framework for building intelligent, stateful AI agents that can persist, think, and evolve at the edge of the Cloudflare network. It offers features such as state management, real-time communication via WebSockets, HTTP endpoints, React integration, and basic AI chat capabilities, with advanced features like memory systems and WebRTC integration under development.
